DOC.brief_summary: Despite widespread grow popularity complementary alternative medicine ( CAM ) US , currently exist significant gap knowledge regard CAM use , clinical effectiveness , safety cost- effectiveness . With previous fund support NCCAM , Harvard Medical School ( HMS ) Osher Research Center establish trained multidisciplinary integrative team CAM conventional provider work collaboratively provide state-of-the-art `` integrative care '' coordinate individualized fashion . The Osher Integrative Care Center ( OCC ) open fall 2007 , physically locate within Ambulatory Care Center Brigham Women 's Hospital ( BWH ) 850 Boylston Street Chestnut Hill , MA . The focus survey study characterize decision-making process patient conventional provider respect communication referral integrative care team academic hospital outpatient setting .
DOC.brief_title: Use Effectiveness Model Integrative Care Clinic Academic Hospital : Study 1-Survey
